title: Google Stock Ownership - Who Owns Google in 2025? | WallStreetZen
snippet: Google (NASDAQ: GOOGL) is owned by 62.53% institutional shareholders, 3.85% Google insiders, and 33.61% retail investors. Brin Sergey is the largest individual Google shareholder, owning 360.14M shares representing 2.98% of the company.

title: Who Owns Google in 2025? Read about Alphabet Inc.!
snippet: Alphabet Inc.’s unique ownership structure balances founder control with public investment, enabling Google to remain a tech titan in 2025.

title: Who owns Alphabet in 2025? GOOGL shareholders explained | Capital.com
snippet: As of June 2025, the largest institutional holders include The Vanguard Group (7.73%), BlackRock (6.55%) and State Street Global Advisors (3.47%), followed by FMR LLC, Capital Research and Management Company, and T.

title: Who Owns Google? | The Motley Fool
snippet: By Matthew Frankel, CFP – Updated Oct 15, 2025 at 1:16 PM EST | Fact-checked by Margo Winton Parodi ... Alphabet Inc. is the parent company of Google and publicly traded under NASDAQ:GOOGL and GOOG.
